{"id":1442435903,"question_id":3451,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 5 days","timestamp":1730699710,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"29 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1442435903/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"String Compression III","memory":"29.8 MB","code":"#include<string>\n\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n\n    string compressedString(string word) {\n\n        if(word.length() == 0){\n            return word;\n        }\n\n        char curr_char = word[0];\n        int curr_count = 0;\n\n        string out = \"\";\n\n        for(int i=0; i<word.length(); i++){\n            if(word[i] == curr_char){\n                curr_count++;\n            }\n            else{\n                while(curr_count != 0){\n                    if(curr_count > 9){\n                        out += to_string(9);\n                        out += curr_char;\n                        curr_count -= 9;\n                    }\n                    else{\n                        out += to_string(curr_count);\n                        out += curr_char;\n                        curr_count = 0;\n                    }\n                }\n\n                curr_char = word[i];\n                curr_count = 1;\n            }\n        }\n        while(curr_count != 0){\n            if(curr_count > 9){\n                out += to_string(9);\n                out += curr_char;\n                curr_count -= 9;\n            }\n            else{\n                out += to_string(curr_count);\n                out += curr_char;\n                curr_count = 0;\n            }\n        }\n        return out;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"string-compression-iii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
